display: Computers and Control Systems >> Electrical (Specifications) >> Sensor Functional Range Charts
title: Sensor Functional Range Charts
content:
COOLANT TEMPERATURE SENSOR

Temperature to Resistance Values (Approximate)

    °F        °C                  Ohms
    70      21                7,000-13,000
    200     93                700-1,000


CHARGE TEMPERATURE SENSOR

Temperature to Resistance Values (Approximate)

    °F        °C                  Ohms
    70      21                7,000-13,000
    200     93                700-1,000


THROTTLE POSITION SENSOR

Output Voltage (Approximate)

    0.5 volts at idle to
    3.8 volts at WOT


CRANKSHAFT POSITION SENSOR

Output Voltage

    0.3 volts low
    5.0 volts high


CAMSHAFT POSITION SENSOR

Output Voltage

    0.3 volts low
    5.0 volts high

MAP SENSOR

Output Voltage (Approximate)

    1.0 - 1.5 volts idle
    1.5 - 3.0 volts cruise
    3.0 - 4.5 volts WOT
